name: SXSWXSXWXSXW
description:
It's that time of year again, Austinites! Or so we thought! With the cancellation of SXSW, locals' hopes of learning about 8 bands with the word "mom" in their name or briefly encountering Nick Offerman in a Whataburger were dashed before our very eyes.  But somewhere else, somewhere far away, an arts festival is happening... the breath of the devil is on the wind.... old prophecies become new again.... the sky seems to close around us like a opaque fishbowl... Who is that tiny man from Spokane? Should I do psychedelics even though I'm 28? What happens when Facebook offers to sponsor me? Step into SXSWXSXWXSXW and be forever changed. The egg demands more than a sacrifice.

--

10-15 minute playtime

Developed in one month by August Smith for the cancelled "Drivel Dravel" SXSW event.

All donations will go to the Austin Relief Fund to support workers affected by SXSW and recent closures.
